title: fragment:scp-5045b
content:
[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Caveat&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Didact+Gothic&display=swap');


div#container-wrap {
     background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5045/light_bg2.png") top left repeat-x;
}

#side-bar .side-block {
    background: #000000;
}

#side-bar div.side-block:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) img {
    filter: none;
    -webkit-filter: none;
}

#side-bar .scpnet-interwiki-wrapper {
    width: 0em;
}

body {
    background-color: #000000;
    font-family: 'Didact Gothic', monospace;
    color: #000000;
}

#page-title {
  text-align: center;
}

#header h1 span {
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}
 
#header h1 span::before {
     content: 'farmers farmhouse';
     color: #32CD32;
     text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.8);
}

#header {background-image: url()}
#header h2 span {
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}
 
#header h2 span::before {
     content: 'i wasnt asking';
     color: #FF00FF;
     text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.8);
}
[[/module]]

@@ @@
